statement.content: Gonna answer a bunch of stuff at once (thanks slow mode).   1.  I don't have twitter, I'm more of a lurker on social media.  2.  Fishing will be more involved than AC, yes.  We're more like Stardew there.  3.  We plan on having things like time of day affect fish, yes.  Can't say anything specific yet though.  4.  If you can kill or catch it I'm responsible for the design, just remember there are a whole lot of other folks on the team (artists and programmers) who are essential for bringing them into the game.
